item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, May 6, 2024 at 11:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Russian finance flows slump after US targets Putin’s war machine
2. Russia plotting sabotage across Europe, intelligence agencies warn
3.  Routed Conservatives should end Britain’s damaging drift
4. Finland boosts war readiness in face of Russian aggression
5. Buffett lays out expansive role for successor Greg Abel at poignant Berkshire AGM
